recipeInfo: Breaded chicken breasts topped with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese, served over pasta.
Japanese-style sushi rolls with various fillings such as crab, avocado, and cucumber.
A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts.
Soft or crispy tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa.
A classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
A simple sandwich made with bread and melted cheese, often served with tomato soup.
